member.name: M:NumericalCalculator.Differential.ComputeDifferential(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Double)
member.param: Point at which return the value
Makes output better look. For example outputs 4.0 instead 4,000000000000001 or 3,999999999999999

member.summary: Compute all function values from starting point to valueLookingPoint
member.param: Makes output better look. For example outputs 4.0 instead 4,000000000000001 or 3,999999999999999
